Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm having trouble with clicking on a link to a new page and it skipping halfway down the page automatically? Does anyone know of a fix? Thanks!
Posts.HTML: Hi, I'm having trouble with clicking on a link to a new page and it skipping halfway down the page automatically? Does anyone know of a fix? Thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
First you should click on the page 'game' on your prohect.

Then where you see "Setup,  Script, Display". Choose  "Script" and press the plus button.

Under output, there should be an option that says "Run Javascript" Click it.

Then paste this code into it, in it's entirety...

eval ("scrollToEnd=function () {};")

After that, the automatic scroll to the bottom should stop!
Posts.HTML:
First you should click on the page 'game' on your prohect.

Then where you see "Setup, Script, Display". Choose "Script" and press the plus button.

Under output, there should be an option that says "Run Javascript" Click it.

Then paste this code into it, in it's entirety...

eval ("scrollToEnd=function () {};")

After that, the automatic scroll to the bottom should stop!
